trans-unit.source: Creates and provides information about [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] serializers.
trans-unit.target: Hoz létre, és információt nyújt [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] objektumszerializáló.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializerFactory"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializerFactory"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"></xref> that outputs [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content to a specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Létrehoz egy <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"> </xref> , amelyek kimenete [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] megadott <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream> tartalom

trans-unit.source: The output stream that the returned serializer is to write to.
trans-unit.target: A kimeneti adatfolyamba, a visszaadott szerializáló írni.

trans-unit.source: An output writer that serializes [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content to the specified stream.
trans-unit.target: Egy kimenetíró, amely rendezi sorba [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] a tartalom a megadott stream .

trans-unit.source: Gets the standard file name extension for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documents.
This method always returns the string ".xps".
trans-unit.target: Ez a metódus mindig ".xps" karakterláncot adja vissza.

trans-unit.source: The standard file name extension (including the leading period) for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documents.
trans-unit.target: A szabványos kiterjesztése (beleértve a kezdődhetnek ponttal) [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] dokumentumok.

trans-unit.source: Gets the public name for the serializers that the factory produces.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a objektumszerializáló, amely a gyári nyilvános nevét.

trans-unit.source: This method always returns the string "XPS Serializer".
trans-unit.target: Ez a metódus mindig "XPS szerializáló" karakterláncot adja vissza.

trans-unit.source: The public name for serializers that the factory produces.
trans-unit.target: A nyilvános nevet, amely a gyári objektumszerializáló.

trans-unit.source: Gets the manufacturer's name for serializers that the factory produces.
trans-unit.target: Lekéri a gyártó nevét, amely a gyári objektumszerializáló.

trans-unit.source: This method always returns the string "Microsoft".
trans-unit.target: Ez a metódus mindig "Microsoft" karakterláncot adja vissza.

trans-unit.source: Gets the manufacturer's Web address for serializers that the factory produces.
trans-unit.target: Lekéri a gyártó címet, amely a gyári objektumszerializáló.
Ez a metódus mindig adja meg a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] "http://www.microsoft.com".
